channel.title: Help!
channel.description: Please can someone help me :( I want my friend to join my server, but I don't know how. I have done everything needed. I have put it on mopar, but when he tries to get on it just kicks him right away or his character is super messed up and then a few seconds later he gets kicked again.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @qtst35 qtst35
item.description:
@qtst35 wrote:

check list:

have you made a no ip. orgave him your ip.
have you changed the ip of the server client sided*
have you portforwarded your router? if not go to http://portforward.com/ to learn how to for your router.
have you give him the correct ip to connect to.
is the server online.

i take it you can log in on 127.0.0.1 so it is a connection problem so i sujest the port forwarding step. double check that

Read full topic
